name: iyeris
description: A beautiful cross-platform file explorer built with Electron, featuring a simple yet advanced modern design.

scripts.build: node build/dist-tools.js clean && tsc --project tsconfig.main.json && tsc --project tsconfig.renderer.json && node build/dist-tools.js copy
scripts.build:win:msi:x64: npm run build && electron-builder --win msi --x64 --publish never
scripts.build:win:msi:arm64: npm run build && electron-builder --win msi --arm64 --publish never
scripts.build:win:all: npm run build && electron-builder --win nsis msi --arm64 --x64
scripts.build:mac:mas: npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --mac mas --universal
scripts.build:linux: npm run build && electron-builder --linux AppImage deb rpm --x64 --arm64
scripts.build:linux:all: npm run build:linux && npm run flatpak:clean && npm run flatpak:bundle
scripts.build:linux:all:native: npm run build:linux:native && npm run flatpak:clean && npm run flatpak:bundle
scripts.build:linux:x64: npm run build && electron-builder --linux AppImage deb rpm --x64
scripts.build:linux:arm64: npm run build && electron-builder --linux AppImage deb rpm --arm64
scripts.build:linux:native: npm run build && USE_SYSTEM_FPM=true electron-builder --linux AppImage deb rpm --x64 --arm64
scripts.flatpak:bundle: flatpak-builder --repo=repo --force-clean build-dir com.burnttoasters.iyeris.yml && flatpak build-bundle repo release/IYERIS-Linux.flatpak com.burnttoasters.iyeris
scripts.build:beta:win: npm run patch:beta && cross-env IS_BETA=true npm run build && electron-builder --win --arm64 --x64 -c.win.icon=assets/icon-square-beta.ico && npm run restore:release
scripts.build:beta:win:x64: npm run patch:beta && cross-env IS_BETA=true npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64 --publish never -c.win.icon=assets/icon-square-beta.ico && npm run restore:release
scripts.build:beta:mac: npm run patch:beta && cross-env IS_BETA=true npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --mac --universal -c.mac.icon=assets/iyeris-beta.icns && npm run restore:release
scripts.build:beta:linux: npm run patch:beta && cross-env IS_BETA=true npm run build && electron-builder --linux AppImage deb rpm --x64 --arm64 -c.linux.icon=assets/icon-beta.png && npm run restore:release
scripts.build:beta:linux:native: npm run patch:beta && cross-env IS_BETA=true npm run build && USE_SYSTEM_FPM=true electron-builder --linux AppImage deb rpm --x64 --arm64 -c.linux.icon=assets/icon-beta.png && npm run restore:release
scripts.release:mac: npm run release:prepare && npm run licenses && npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --mac --universal --publish always && npm run sign:gpg
scripts.release:win: npm run release:prepare && npm run licenses && npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --win nsis msi --arm64 --x64 --publish always && npm run sign:gpg
scripts.release:win:nsis: npm run release:prepare && npm run licenses && npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --win nsis --arm64 --x64 --publish always && npm run sign:gpg
scripts.release:win:msi: npm run release:prepare && npm run licenses && npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --win msi --arm64 --x64 --publish always && npm run sign:gpg
scripts.release:linux: npm run release:prepare && npm run licenses && npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --linux AppImage deb rpm --x64 --arm64 --publish always && npm run flatpak:clean && npm run flatpak:bundle && npm run sign:gpg
scripts.release:linux:native: npm run release:prepare && npm run licenses && npm run build && cross-env USE_SYSTEM_FPM=true dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --linux AppImage deb rpm --x64 --arm64 --publish always && npm run flatpak:clean && npm run flatpak:bundle && npm run sign:gpg
scripts.release:all: npm run licenses && npm run release:mac && npm run release:win && npm run release:linux
scripts.release:beta:mac: npm run release:prepare && npm run licenses && npm run patch:beta && cross-env IS_BETA=true npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --mac --universal -c.mac.icon=assets/iyeris-beta.icns --publish always && npm run restore:release && npm run sign:gpg
scripts.release:beta:win: npm run release:prepare && npm run licenses && npm run patch:beta && cross-env IS_BETA=true npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --win nsis --arm64 --x64 -c.win.icon=assets/icon-square-beta.ico --publish always && npm run restore:release && npm run sign:gpg
scripts.release:beta:linux: npm run release:prepare && npm run licenses && npm run patch:beta && cross-env IS_BETA=true npm run build && dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --linux AppImage deb rpm --x64 --arm64 -c.linux.icon=assets/icon-beta.png --publish always && npm run restore:release && npm run sign:gpg
scripts.release:beta:linux:native: npm run release:prepare && npm run licenses && npm run patch:beta && cross-env IS_BETA=true npm run build && cross-env USE_SYSTEM_FPM=true dotenv -e .env -- electron-builder --linux AppImage deb rpm --x64 --arm64 -c.linux.icon=assets/icon-beta.png --publish always && npm run restore:release && npm run sign:gpg
scripts.release:beta:all: npm run licenses && npm run release:beta:mac && npm run release:beta:win && npm run release:beta:linux
scripts.build:msstore:x64: npm run licenses && npm run build && electron-builder --win --x64 -c electron-builder.msstore.yml --publish never
scripts.build:msstore:arm64: npm run licenses && npm run build && electron-builder --win --arm64 -c electron-builder.msstore.yml --publish never
scripts.build:msstore: npm run licenses && npm run build:msstore:x64 && npm run build:msstore:arm64
